# backgroundColor

**Instance Property**

Returns the current background color of the receiver.

## Declaration

```swift
@NSCopying @MainActor var backgroundColor: NSColor? { get set }
```

## Return Value

The background color.

## Setting Cell Appearance

- **placeholderAttributedString**: Sets the value of the placeholder attributed string.
- **placeholderString**: Returns the placeholder string.
